content: @emilylaineyarnshop georgia sunset cowl 4×2 rib knit cowl pattern yarn juniper moon farm cumulus dappled or any worsted weight yarn approx 175 225 yards needles 5 0 mm us 8 16 circular knitting needles notions stitch marker tapestry needle gauge not critical cast on 96 stitches stitch pattern k4 p2 rib instructions 1 cast on cast on 96 stitches using your preferred method place a stitch marker and join to work in the round being careful not to twist 2 rib stitch pattern round 1 k4 p2 around repeat round 1 for the entire cowl continue knitting in this 4×2 rib for 8 10 inches depending on how tall you want your cowl 8 inches = cozy fit 10+ inches = taller more foldable cowl optional edges if you want a cleaner edge you may work the first 3-5 and last 3 5 rounds with k1 p1 rib 3 bind off bind off loosely in pattern knit the knits purl the purls weave in ends finished size approx circumference ~22 unstretched height 8 12 depending on your preference www emilylaineyarnshop com
